messages.title: A Fair Deal for Ceredigion
messages.content: Mike Parker will form a strong team with Elin Jones AM to fight our corner in Westminster and Cardiff. As a travel author, Mike is an expert at the outside world, and he is committed to do everything possible to make Ceredigion the thriving county it deserves to be.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to economic resilience, protecting public services, investment in apprenticeships and infrastructure for better connectivity.
Promises improved local healthcare facilities and opposes the downgrading of Bronglais Hospital.
Has a strong record on environmental issues, including opposing fracking and new open-cast mining developments.
Advocates for fair funding for Ceredigion and opposes cuts to public services.

issues.brexitEurope: Mike wants Ceredigion to stand tall in Europe.

leaflet.personalStatement: Mike believes that Britain is at its best when it's compassionate, forward-looking and outward-facing.
